words.translation: Not|were|those who|disbelieved|from|(the) People|of the Book|and the polytheists|to be abandoned|until|(there) comes to them|the clear evidence

translations.1: Lam ya-kunil lazeena kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal-mushri-keena mun-fak-keena hattaa ta-tiya-humul bayyinah
translations.2: Lam yakuni allatheena kafaroo min ahli alkitabi waalmushrikeena munfakkeena hatta tatiyahumu albayyinatu

translations.1: Rasoolum minal laahi yatlu suhufam mutahharah

words.translation: And not|became divided|those who|were given|the Book|until|from|after|what|came (to) them|(of) the clear evidence

translations.1: Wa-maa tafarraqal lazeena ootul kitaaba il-la mim b'adi ma jaa-at-humul baiyyinah
translations.2: Wama tafarraqa allatheena ootoo alkitaba illa min baAAdi ma jaathumu albayyinatu

words.translation: And not|they were commanded|except|to worship|Allah|(being) sincere|to Him|(in) the religion|upright|and to establish|the prayer|and to give|the Zakah|And that|(is the) religion|the correct

translations.1: Wa-maa umiroo il-la liy'abu-dul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena huna-faa-a Wa-yuqeemus salaata Wa-yu-tuz zakaata; Wa-zaalika deenul qaiyimah
translations.2: Wama omiroo illa liyaAAbudoo Allaha mukhliseena lahu alddeena hunafaa wayuqeemoo alssalata wayutoo alzzakata wathalika deenu alqayyimati

words.translation: Indeed|those who|disbelieve|from|(the) People|(of) the Book|and the polytheists|(will be) in|(the) Fire|(of) Hell|abiding eternally|therein|Those|they|(are the) worst|(of) the creatures

translations.1: Innal lazeena kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal-mushri-keena fee nari jahan-nama khaali-deena feeha; ulaa-ika hum shar-rul ba-reeyah
translations.2: Inna allatheena kafaroo min ahli alkitabi waalmushrikeena fee nari jahannama khalideena feeha olaika hum sharru albariyyati

words.translation: Indeed|those who|believe|and do|righteous deeds|those|they|(are the) best|(of) the creatures

translations.1: Innal lazeena aamanu Wa-'amilus saalihaati ula-ika hum khairul bareey-yah
translations.2: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati olaika hum khayru albariyyati

words.translation: Their reward|(is) with|their Lord|Gardens|(of) Eternity|flow|from|underneath them|the rivers|will abide|therein|forever|(will be) pleased|Allah|with them|and they (will be) pleased|with Him|That|(is) for whoever|feared|his Lord

translations.1: Jazaa-uhum inda rabbihim jan-naatu 'adnin tajree min tahtihal an-haaru khalideena feeha abada; radiy yallaahu 'anhum Wa-ra-du 'an zaalika liman khashiya rabbah
translations.2: Jazaohum AAinda rabbihim jannatu AAadnin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha abadan radiya Allahu AAanhum waradoo AAanhu thalika liman khashiya rabbahu
